text: Luis Jaime Salom Horrach (7 August 1991 - 3 June 2016) was a Spanish Grand Prix motorcycle racer. He was born in Palma, Majorca. Salom won his first Grand Prix in Indianapolis in 2012, beating Sandro Cortese and Maverick Vi√±ales in a last-lap fight. He also won at Aragon. He finished the championship in second behind Cortese. ==Death== Salom died on 3 June 2016 while racing in the 2016 Catalan Moto2 Grand Prix in Barcelona after crashing against a wall, aged 24. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile on motogp.com * Category:1991 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths in sport Category:Spanish motorcycle racers
